sentences: György Fischer (12 August 1935 – 25 October 2020) was a Hungarian pianist and conductor.
Assistant to Herbert von Karajan at the Vienna Opera, he became a specialist in the works of Mozart, conducting operas in Cologne, Munich, and South America.
He performed with the Australian Opera in 1987.
First he married opera singer Lucia Popp.
After being divorced from her he married American violinist Ida Bieler.
His sister-in-law was Hungarian actress Flóra Kádár, the first wife of his elder brother, DOP and photojournalist Péter Fischer.
